title.en: Robot Travel Guide + Magic Sword Secret Book

altTitles.ja: ロボット旅がらす+魔剣秘帖

description.en:
"It's really bad."
Where will it go next!?
Robot Kantaro's yakuza family business that travels from journey to journey!

Maetani version of “Daibosatsu Pass”!?
Simultaneous recording of historical action drama “Maken Hicho”!

[Commentary]
The 19th installment of Koremitsu Maetani's masterpiece collection is...
"If you do not see righteousness, there is no courage.''
Robot Kantaro, also known as Robot Kan, lives as a foreigner!
A full-fledged historical drama about hidden treasures, ``Maken Hicho'' ” is included!!

<Robot Travel Guide>
Robot Kantaro travels aimlessly on both sunny and rainy days!
A thrilling tale of becoming a bodyguard and punishing evil yakuza bosses
and evil magistrates!

<Maken Hicho 1>
Kotaro Sakon pursues Kennosuke Agi, who killed his father and stole the treasured sword Bosatsumaru, and works hard at sword training in order to take revenge.
Meanwhile, Kennosuke repeatedly commits atrocious acts of cross-cutting with Bosatsumaru.

<Maken Hicho 2>
As Kotaro and his party search for Takeda's treasure as military funding for the overthrow of the Shogunate, the Tokugawa Aoi-gumi and their nemesis Kennosuke Agi approach!
Who will own the treasure?
